title: Fully Furnished 1 Bedroom Apartment (28 Exeter St Boston)
neighborhood: Brownstone in A+ Back Bay/South End Location
posting_body: Please read carefully if you are interested in applying.
APARTMENT FOR RENT; Available now or Aug 15th/Sep 1.
Showings starting this week!!
1-bedroom apartment, 1 bath.
***VERY Clean Apartment Unit***
Rent $2550/month (Negotiable), plus the tenant pays own heat, electric, and hot water est betw $50-170/month.
First, Last due at signing, Security deposit is negotiable.
Prefer a 12 month lease, but terms are negotiable.
Housing vouchers or agencies welcome to inquire.
This is a real apartment, not a share.
Boston's best Back Bay luxury apartment complexes in the form of 28 Exeter at Newbury.
Located near the shops and cafes of Newbury Street, the Boston Public Library and the Public Garden, the building offers convenient access to everything the Back Bay has to offer.
We offer two and one-bedroom luxury units located in the heart of Back Bay Boston.

Built-in 1979, this 102,000-square-foot, nine-story luxury mid-rise has 96 one and two-bedroom apartments and is located in the heart of Boston's Back Bay, on the corner of Newbury and Exeter Streets.
The property has been continually upgraded to feature granite countertops, hardwood floors, energy star appliances, and new kitchens and bathrooms.
The property offers 24/7 concierge service, as well as a smoke-free, pet-friendly environment.
10 min walk to Field's Corner T, on Bus lines.
Friendly neighbors on our street!
On-street parking only, small shared yard, Not De-Lead Certified.
No Smoking, No growing indoors, and No pets... sorry.
Possible shared laundry machines in basement with the owner/other tenants.
Quiet hours and house rules need to be followed.
~ Preference to applicants who love Boston and want to live/stay/invest in our community here!
Showings starting this week!!
IMPORTANT: Emails without ALL this info will not get a response:
A.
The names of the people who will be living/staying in the apartment.
B. Your email address(s)
C. Your best Tel number
D. Some good times and days to call you in the next few days
E. Anything else you want to ask, share or disclose.
F. Please allow 1-3 days for my response, but every effort to call people will be made (from 978-area code).
IMPORTANT - please respond with A-E!
